title: where is my new snowdown skin?
body: Today is 16th December already why cant we buy the new snowdown skin - - please riot i want it

replies.body: Probably going off NA time. Be patient.
IT IS NA TIME 16TH DECEMBER 12:00 AM ! HOW CAN I BELIEVE THIS
